data.title: A Very Dangerous Movie
data.meta_description: I'm thrilled that my award-winning picture book Dangerously Ever After is being made into a stop-motion film by Fantasiation Studios. My story about an unconventional princess and her dangerous garden has fans from all over the world.
data.text:
I'm thrilled that my award-winning picture book Dangerously Ever After is being made into a stop-motion film by Fantasiation Studios.

My story about an unconventional princess and her dangerous garden has fans from all over the world. When the 7 year old daughter of director Alba Garcia fell in love with the book, Alba felt she had to make a film.

Alba has assembled an amazing cast and crew who are building sets, props and puppets based on the original illustrations by Valeria Docampo. Now we just need the funds to print the 3-D faces and hire animators.
